rooms.description: Vastu-aligned entrance ensuring positive energy flow.
Open-plan living area with Chettinad style decorative elements, natural lighting and adequate ventilation as per Vastu.
Adjacent to the kitchen, fostering social interactions; positioned in the auspicious east-west direction according to Vastu principles.
Functional and modern kitchen area, preferably placed in a north or northeast corner as per Vastu norms.
Master bedroom with attached bathroom; designed for optimal natural light and air circulation.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy while maintaining a balanced spatial layout as per Vastu.
Smaller bedroom for guests or children, aligned with natural energy flow.
Entertainment space featuring advanced acoustics and visual aesthetics; integrated into the living area design as per Chettinad farmhouse style.
Bathroom for common use or attached to master bedroom; positioned according to Vastu guidelines for water elements.

openings.description: Entrance door designed to welcome positive energy in line with Vastu principles.
Large windows ensuring ample natural light, placed strategically according to Vastu guidelines for optimal ventilation.
Balcony or verandah providing a view and additional light; designed to balance the Chettinad style with modern needs.
Service door for efficient movement between kitchen and storage areas, adhering to functional design guidelines.
